sections.title: Yoga Therapy
sections.copy: Grounding flows led by Rohith to unlock mobility, balance, and mindful breath work.

callout.title: Whole-person transformation.
callout.copy: We layer movement, mindset, and motivation so you can sustain progress without burning out.
